item.title: How We Created a Realtime Patient Monitoring System With Go and Vue in 3 days
item.description: A Pandemic started In the last November in 2019, we heard about the first case of unknown deadly diseases from China. Now everyone knows it as Covid-19 Now it seems to change our lives forever. The virus is deadly and it is highly contagious. Still, we know very little about it. I truly hope we will find some cure soon. Corona Virus Covid-19 attacks Sri Lanka Due to the nature of the virus, it was very hard to stop it from spreading.
